subject: Labor
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Roberts was a prominent arbitrator best known for his ruling that major league baseball owners had improperly colluded to prevent free-agent players from obtaining richer contracts.
snippet: Mr. Roberts was a prominent arbitrator best known for his ruling that major league baseball owners had improperly colluded to prevent free-agent players from obtaining richer contracts.
